articles.title: Google hits setback in bid to overturn multibillion EU antitrust fine in Android case - AP News
articles.description: Google faces a big setback in its attempt to overturn a multibillion-dollar European Union antitrust penalty involving Android after a top court’s legal adviser sided with regulators. The European Court of Justice’s advocate general recommended in a prelimina…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Google faced a big setback Thursday in its attempt to overturn a multibillion-dollar European Union antitrust penalty involving Android after a top courts legal adviser sided with regulat… [+1672 chars]
